Title: Touch
Writer: Mike Flanagan (created by), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel by), Elizabeth Ann Phang
Actors: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Henry Thomas, Elizabeth Reaser
Plot: Keenly perceptive Theo sees shades of herself in a troubled young patient, a girl who's haunted by the menacing grin of "Mr. Smiley."
